components.name: Fluent Dialog
components.description: Official Microsoft Fluent UI dialog/modal component with overlay
components.htmlCode:
Information Dialog

This is a basic information dialog. It can contain text, images, and other content to convey important information to the user.

Dialogs are modal windows that require user interaction before they can return to the main interface.
